title.narrative: Emergency agriculture intervention in support to the returnees reintegration process in the provinces of Bururi, Makamba and Rutana

description.narrative: (a) 1 kit made of vegetable seeds (300 g), 10 kg of adapted and diversified bean seeds and a kit of assorted agriculture tools and inputs (fertilizers, pesticides, garden-ing tools) to increase agriculture productivity; (b) training on basic techniques related to agricultural and in particular vegetable production; (ii) 1 000 households will receive 3 goats as a basis for the establishment of the community solidarity chain system which in turn will benefit to other vulnerable households; (iii) 18 000 banana vitro plants and 12 000 fruit seedlings will be made available to identi-fied beneficiaries and installed near their home vicinity; (iv) 3 600 000 sweet potatoes cuttings (600 cuttings per family) and 3000 000 cassava cuttings (500 cuttings per family) of productive and tolerant to the severe cassava mosaic strain will be distributed to targeted beneficiaries.
